"Hello! You're ARKS, aren't you?": "I'm Xie. I'm planning to hold all sorts of events on Oracle."
"But it's pretty difficult work. Hey, I know! If you get a chance, could you help me?"
"If that's OK, please talk to me again!"
"Everything going smoothly? I'll wait as long as it takes!"

みんなが笑顔になってくれるから！"
